author: Mark Scolforo, Michael Rubinkam
title: Wolf mandates masks as GOP seeks to relax business shutdown - Associated Press
description: HARRISBURG, Pa. (AP) — Going to a Pennsylvania supermarket, home improvement center, pharmacy or other business that remains open during the pandemic? Be prepared to wear a mask. That goes for...
content:
HARRISBURG, Pa. (AP) Going to a Pennsylvania supermarket, home improvement center, pharmacy or other business that remains open during the pandemic? Be prepared to wear a mask. That goes for workers, too.
Many commercial buildings that serve the public will … [+6423 chars]
